unnormalised: **New Wheels Galore: Auto Sector Heats Up!**
normalised: **New Wheels Galore: Auto Sector Heats Up!**

unnormalised: Folks, get your wallets ready! The Indian auto market is buzzing with new vehicle launches this month. Dr. Iyer at IIT Madras just unveiled their prototype EV, the "Vidyut Vahan," promising a range of 300 km on a single charge. Looks promising for tackling those Bangalore traffic jams!
normalised: Folks, get your wallets ready! The Indian auto market is buzzing with new vehicle launches this month. Doctor Iyer at I I T Madras just unveiled their prototype E V, the "Vidyut Vahan," promising a range of three hundred kilometer on a single charge. Looks promising for tackling those Bangalore traffic jams!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Maruti Suzuki just dropped the new "Breeze" hatchback, starting at Rs. 6 Lakh. Expect to see these zipping around Connaught Place soon. Tata Motors isn't far behind, teasing a rugged SUV aimed at conquering Leh-Ladakh terrain.
normalised: Meanwhile, Maruti Suzuki just dropped the new "Breeze" hatchback, starting at rupee six lakh. Expect to see these zipping around Connaught Place soon. Tata Motors isn't far behind, teasing a rugged S U V aimed at conquering Leh-Ladakh terrain.

unnormalised: And for those with deeper pockets, BMW launched its luxury sedan in a swanky event in Mumbai. Think plush interiors and enough legroom to stretch out in like you're in your own living room! Apparently, the showroom boasts a massive 5000 sq ft display area. It's raining cars, people! Get ready to test drive.
normalised: And for those with deeper pockets, B M W launched its luxury sedan in a swanky event in Mumbai. Think plush interiors and enough legroom to stretch out in like you're in your own living room! Apparently, the showroom boasts a massive five thousand square feet display area. It's raining cars, people! Get ready to test drive.
